attributes.action: Ban the sale of Disposable barbecue's.
attributes.additional_details:
As a result, people are using disposable barbeques which not only litter our beautiful landscapes but as a result cause wildfires because of the dry temperatures. A few links providing insight to the condition our beauty spots are being left in.
https://www.facebook.com/groups/derbyshireandpeakdistrictwalks/permalink/675692856329475/ 

https://www.facebook.com/groups/derbyshireandpeakdistrictwalks/permalink/674916199740474/

https://www.facebook.com/197734856948651/posts/2938745082847601/
attributes.background: In light of the recent reduction in lockdown measures provided by the UK government, people have flocked to beauty spots all around the UK to enjoy spending time with their friends and families. All this coincided with the hottest May on record.
